name: Ben
overview: A brain\logic game, created by Jürgen (Juergen) Graser and Timo Peichl, published in Game On 1989/03. This is a game about a little man with great problems. He has to put the cases on the marked points. To make this difficult he can only push the cases and not pull them, something about health and safety requirements and increased back injury due to pulling. So help him solve his problems safely!
